item.title: T-1 Digital Phone Lines For PBX Systems
item.description: Many modern business phone systems utilize T-1 lines to link their buildings to the local telephone company. This is because merging multiple individual lines into one or two T-1 lines is more cost-efficient. This holds true whether your internal phone system is analog or digital, as even most VoIP systems rely on T-1 lines for external calls. Smaller setups like basic one or two-line phones or key systems with 4-6 lines typically use analog lines.

item.title: TW Telecom's Extensive Service Portfolio
item.description: tw telecom is a full-service communications provider with a privately owned, nationwide fiber optic network. They provide service in 75 major markets and over 8,800 commercial buildings. Their network spans more than 26,000 route miles and features a 10 Gbps IP backbone. They offer a wide array of services, from affordable T1 lines to high-speed Carrier Ethernet services ranging from 2 Mbps to 10 Gbps. You might recognize the name tw telecom from its previous iterations.
